description:
The really messed up thing about all of it is they are allowed to do it while we are forced to react to whatever lie they tell us.  Meanwhile, people still talk about the constitution like none of what I just mentioned is actually happening. 
How exactly do you have freedom if the government chooses when you can or cannot express that freedom? 
How exactly can the constitution be void during a pandemic if the constitution exists explicitly to stop a government from growing tyrannical? 
The world is a stage...don’t be the crowd at the magic show. 
#coronavirus #coronavirushoax #plannedemic #plandemic #billgates #newworldorder #socialdistancing #covid_1984 #propaganda #operationmockingbird #policestate
